page.title: 08A Day in my Life (contd)
page.content: ...This is an enjoyable{event}at the weekend. The hut is about fifteen or twenty minutes away if you are walking. It has two rooms and one is a bedroom. I go down with my mum and two younger brothers. We stay there until half past four, and then go up to the house where I get my{lambs}milk ready. After I{feed} them and wash the bottles, I help my mum as my big sister is{milking}the cows. We have our tea at half past five. After tea I go to the dam and have a swim. Then I go to bed.
